              def self.get_a_random_status
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            35
            

            

                case rand(3)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                  when 0
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            12
            

            

                    return 'pending'
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                  when 1
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            9
            

            

                    return 'shipped'
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                  when 2
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            14
            

            

                    return 'returned'
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      43.

              def standard_deviation(values, mean)
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            37
            

            

                sums = values.sum { |value| (value - mean)**2 }
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            3
            

            

                std_dev = Math.sqrt(sums / (values.length - 1).to_f)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            3
            

            

                std_dev.round(2)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

              end

            2
            

            

                unless transaction.nil?

                it 'returns the item id' do

                  ii_details = {

                it 'returns a random status' do

                  actual_status = InvoiceMocks.get_a_random_status
          
      80.

            1

            1
            

            

                  expect(possible_statuses.include?(actual_status)).to be true

                it 'does not delete anything without a valid id' do
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            1
            

            

                  mock_data = InvoiceMocks.invoices_as_mocks(self)
          
      182.

            1
            

            

                  allow_any_instance_of(InvoiceRepository).to receive(:create_invoices).and_return(mock_data)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            1
            

            

                  invoice_repository = InvoiceRepository.new('fake.csv')
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                  new_invoice = {
          
      186.

              describe '#create' do

            1
            

            

                it 'creates an Item class object' do
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            1
            

            

                  mock_data = ItemMocks.items_as_mocks(self)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            1
            

            

                  allow_any_instance_of(ItemRepository).to receive(:create_items).and_return(mock_data)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            1
            

            

                  item_repository = ItemRepository.new('fake.csv')
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

                  new_item = {
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            1
            

            

                    id: nil,
          
      157.

    spec/merchant_repository_spec.rb

    100.0% lines covered

    104 relevant lines. 104 lines covered and 0 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            1
            

            

            require './data/merchant_mocks'
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            1
            

            

            require './lib/merchant'
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            1
            

            

            require './lib/merchant_repository'
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            1
            

            

            describe MerchantRepository do
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            1
            

            

              describe '#initialize' do
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            1
            

            

                it 'exists' do
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            1
            

            

                  mock_data = MerchantMocks.merchants_as_hashes
          
      9.

              describe '#initialize' do

                it 'exists' do

    6. 
            
            

            

                  details = {
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            1

            1

              describe '#average_items_per_merchant_standard_deviation' do

                it 'calculates standard deviation for average items per merchant' do

            1
            

            

                  expect(transaction.result).to eq 'success'
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            1
            

            

              describe '#update_time' do
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            1
            

            

                it 'updates Transaction updated_at time' do
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

                  details = {
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            1
            

            

                    id: 6,
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

                    invoice_id: 8,
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

                    credit_card_number: '4242424242424242',
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

                    credit_card_expiration_date: '0220',
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

                    result: 'failure',
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

                    created_at: Time.now,
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

                    updated_at: Time.new(2021, 0o4, 0o1)
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            
            

            

                  }
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            1
            

            

                  transaction = Transaction.new(details)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            1
            

            

                  transaction.update_time
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            1
            

            

                  expect(transaction.updated_at).to be > Time.new(2021, 0o2, 0o4)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      207.
